EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-27-HyperFlex-AppD.June_Webinar-2018-06-20-HyperFlex-AppD Email 3.Las
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] App-Aware, Full Stack Optimization for Hyperconverged Infrastructures| Last Chance to Register
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
This is your last call to attend tomorrow’s LIVE panel discussion webinar at 1 pm ET. Join our technical experts from Cisco and Turbonomic as they discuss the benefits of App-Aware, Full-Stack Optimization with Turbonomic, Hyperflex, and AppDynamics <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>
During the webinar, you will learn how to deliver application awareness, cloud elasticity on-prem, supercluster optimization in more – to drive better decisions through infrastructure.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
P.S. If you can't join us live, please feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
